articles.title: Speaking without vocal cords, thanks to a new AI-assisted wearable device - Tech Xplore
articles.description: People with voice disorders, including those with pathological vocal cord conditions or who are recovering from laryngeal cancer surgeries, can often find it difficult or impossible to speak. That may soon change.
